page.title: 10A Bed And Breakfast Business
page.content: Mrs Arthur is our dinner lady. She lives a mile up the road. As well as being our dinner lady she does a bed and breakfast service.She has had very famous people like Richard Whitmore off BBC television.The average amount of people she has in the week in the winter isn't very many but in the summer it can be 2 to 10 people a night.It varies.The highest amount of people she has had at any one time were some people from Portugal and there were 12 of them.The average time a person stays is over night but ocasionaly they stay longer.Mrs Arthur has been doing a bed and breakfast service for 6 years.She started up the bed and breakfast because she liked meeting people and it was a good way of getting an income without going into town to work.
